title: I was under the impression that Blackwell Road was going to be moved a hundred yards or so to the south of where it currently exits onto Route 133.  I believe the intersection was placed so a traffic light could be installed there to aid traffic flow, especially during rush hour.  Could you provide a status of this effort?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14738
